QuestionJSON.Question: Kendall has decided to build a custom computer. They need a device designed to rotate and move air to cool down the components of the computer. What is the correct technical name for this device?
QuestionJSON.Explanation: Fans are used in computers to move air and cool down the components. Heat sinks dissipate heat in the area of a heat-producing component, and liquid coolers or radiators also dissipate heat but via different mechanisms.
